column1: EVTTITLE_ATEOW_realm_event_99999;Zapadoslavia;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC_ATEOW_realm_event_99999;Legends say that at one time all Slavs where united as brothers
column2: but the great disaster that befell our world tore us apart. Yugoslavia showed that hope of reunification was not lost
column3: and like the Southern Slavs it was only a matter of time until the Western Slavs would find common ground and reunite.\n\nIt was [e_zapadoslavia.Holder.GetFirstNameWithNick] who finally brought the Western Slavs together under the banner of Zapadoslavia. Throughout the new realm
column5: Czechs and Slovaks celebrate this momentous occasion.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA_ATEOW_realm_event_99999;Together we will stand as brothers.;;;;;;;;;x
EVTTITLE_ATEOW_realm_event_99998;Rise of the British Raj;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC_ATEOW_realm_event_99998;Legend tells that
column2: in the distant past
column3: all of India was conquered by the Queen
column4: who personally slew the Hindoo deity Rama when he tried to stop Her. [e_british_india.Holder.GetTitledName] has re-established British rule over India
column5: having seized control of the cities listed in the ancient records as the centers of the subcontinent. A lavish coronation has been organised
column6: and while the British Raj may not yet extend over the whole of India
column7: the foundations for its conquest have been laid.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA_ATEOW_realm_event_99998;The Queen is better able to rule us than our own 'leaders'.;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTB_ATEOW_realm_event_99998;Rule Britannia!;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTC_ATEOW_realm_event_99998;Dharma is all silent - this is a disastrous day.;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTD_ATEOW_realm_event_99998;The perfidious Angleterre grows more powerful!;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTE_ATEOW_realm_event_99998;Bloodthirsty pagans! I pity the Hindoos.;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTF_ATEOW_realm_event_99998;And the weather?;;;;;;;;;x
EVTTITLE_ATEOW_realm_event.99996;Great Russia Restored!;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC_ATEOW_realm_event.99996;Fuck me i can't write this at all.;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTA_ATEOW_realm_event.99996;The world will fear Russia again.;;;;;;;;;x
EVTTITLE_ATEOW_realm_event.99995;CCCP Restored!;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC_ATEOW_realm_event.99995;Fuck me i can't write this at all.;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTA_ATEOW_realm_event.99995;The Stalinist bear rises.;;;;;;;;;x
form_romaraj;Become the King of Gypsies;;;;;;;;;x
form_romaraj_tt;§Y[Root.GetBestName]§! becomes the §YKing of Gypsies§!;;;;;;;;;x

form_romaraj_desc;It is said that a long time ago all Romani people were all united under a King of All Gypsies. Perhaps a powerful enough Romani leader can claim that title for himself again.;;;;;;;;;x
stalin.1.d;My master
column2: [From.GetTitledFirstName]
column3: has trumped up some scandalous lies claiming to prove that you are an unfaithful traitor!;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA_stalin1;This can't be good...;;;;;;;;;x
stalin.2.d;We have found convincing proof that your subject
column2: [From.GetTitledFirstName]
column3: is a traitor in league with the enemies of Lord Stalin!;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA_stalin2;I never trusted them in the first place;;;;;;;;;x
palmarian.1.d;The Pope in Rome has called for a great Crusade
column2: a massive armed struggle by the whole Catholic world against the infidels. Though you have been brought up to believe that the Roman Pope was a false pretender to the title
column3: you start to wonder if the differences between your two faiths really matter in the face of the obviously greater threat of paganism and heresy plaguing the continent. Perhaps you should help these Crusaders? The Pope in Palmar won't like it

column1: EVTOPTA_palmarian.1;I will help my Christian brothers!;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTB_palmarian.1;Let the schismatics fight their own wars;;;;;;;;;x
palmarian.2.d;While you've been riding with the train of knights in the Crusade
column2: you've drawn the odd stares of many of the Crusaders. Clearly your Hispanic complexion and accent have drawn their suspicion. Eventually
column4: heavyset Italian confronts you and asks what a Palmarian is doing in the train of the warriors of God. The crowd is getting restless
column5: and it seems that they'll demand your expulsion soon...;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA_palmarian.2;Beg them to let you stay;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTB_palmarian.2;Prove your worth to them with a show of martial skill;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTC_palmarian.2;Convince them that they're better off with you than without you;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTD_palmarian.2;Lie and tell them you're not a Palmarian;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTE_palmarian.2;Storm off and leave the Crusade altogether;;;;;;;;;x
palmarian.3.d;During your time on Crusade
column2: you have come by necessity to have strong relationships with many of the knights
column3: and have grown fond of several of them. Sometimes
column4: they talk to you about religion
column5: and you have to face the tough question of why the Palmarian Church even exists at all. Were the visions of one seer really sufficient grounds to split with Rome? And besides that
column6: some of the people here have left everything behind
column7: or at least lost vast sums of money
column8: purely for the privelige of taking part in the Holy War. Certainly you rarely saw this kind of ardor in Spain. Could it be that the Roman Church trul yis the real Catholic Church after all?;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA_palmarian.3;God has revealed the truth to me!;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTB_palmarian.3;I believe - but I cannot admit it
column2: I would lose my status.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTC_palmarian.3;They are pleasant friends
column2: but that doesn't make them right.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTD_palmarian.3;Gloria In Excelsis Deo;;;;;;;;;x
palmarian.4.d;You have received an angry letter from your local bishop back in Spain. In it
column2: he curses you for running off to aid the schismatic Church and warns you that you are playing dangerous games with your soul if you continue to struggle in the service of the False Faith. He urges you to return to Spain immediately.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA_palmarian.4;Tell him bluntly to shut up;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTB_palmarian.4;Set off for home immediately - I'm jeopardising my standing too much;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTC_palmarian.4;Lie and convince him that you are not actually on Crusade
column2: just out of the Kingdom for other reasons;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTD_palmarian.4;Provide him with a theological rationale for why your actions are justifiable;;;;;;;;;x
palmarian.5.d;To your surprise
column2: your group has discovered a small family of Palmarians living in an isolated village near the Crusade target. The more vulgar members of your troop
column3: eager to sate their appetite for cruelty
column4: have smashed up much of their property and taunted them for being schismatics. Your heart burns to see such shameful behavior between Christians - aren't we supposed to be fighting the same enemy? But the others will be angry if you interrupt their 'fun'...;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA_palmarian.5;Recompense the family for their loss;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTB_palmarian.5;There's nothing I can do;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTC_palmarian.5;Looks like fun! Let me join!;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTD_palmarian.5;We're here to fight FOR Christians
column2: not against them!;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTE_palmarian.5;Reprimand them publically for their cruelty;;;;;;;;;x
palmarian.6.d;A brave soldier has distinguished himself during the Crusade
column2: and has presented himself to you. He claims to be from a relatively poor family and
column3: seeing that you come from a noble house
column4: thinks it'd be better to join you and serve at your court when the Crusade is over.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA_palmarian.6;There's no such thing as too many good men!;;;;;;;;;x
palmarian.7.d;You have taken part in an assault that captured an important fortification! You have been showered in glory
column2: and the knights are all hailing you as a true crusader!;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA_palmarian.7;Deus Vult!;;;;;;;;;x
palmarian.8.d;With the end of the Crusade
column2: the bands of knights depart. You have no choice but to return home.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA_palmarian.8;Pleasant or not
column2: it certainly was unforgettable.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTNAMEINVADERS1;Wars and Rumours of Wars;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESCINVADERS1;Troubling rumours have been coming west in recent years
column2: speaking of two great empires in the far east which are finally gearing up to settle their centuries-long grievance with each other. The rumours speak of these two realms as 'China' and 'Sibera'
column3: and claim that the two have been constantly feuding for hundreds of years. Whatever the result of this war
column4: it will likely result in complete destruction for the loser.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA_INVADERS1;No concern of ours.;;;;;;;;;x
EVTNAMEINVADERS2;The Cold Wind of the East;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESCINVADERS2;It seems that the Great War in the East is finally over
column2: and the Chinese stand victorious. The Siberian Empire has been utterly crushed. Even now Chinese Governors establish military outposts in the snowy lands of Siberia
column3: and tribute caravans laden with ivory and rare woods make their way to the Imperial City. While many Siberians remain in their homeland and acclimatise to foreign rule
column4: a large group of the Siberian nobility
column6: and peasants have chosen to migrate to the West to escape the wrath of China. Though reduced in size since their defeat
column7: this force is still very large
column8: with a hard core of professional soldiers reinforced by refugees and desperate men trying to find new lives for themselves and their families. Though only a remnant of its former greatness
column9: this Empire-in-Exile could easily prove a grave threat to its neighbors.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA_INVADERS2;And these are the ones who *lost* the war?!;;;;;;;;;x
EVTNAMEINVADERS5;Wings of the Dragon;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESCINVADERS5;It seems that the Great War in the East is finally over
column2: and the Siberians stand victorious. The Great Empire of China has been shattered
column3: and now a Siberian sits upon the Dragon Throne
column4: having declared himself the founder of a new Dynasty and possessor of the Mandate of Heaven. As he prepares his armies for the decades-long task of pacifying the countryside and consolidating his rule
column5: large sections of the defeated Chinese army
column6: nobility and peasantry have chosen to migrate to the West to escape the chaos that is sure to result. Though reduced in size since their defeat
column7: this force is still very large
column8: with a hard core of professional soldiers reinforced by refugees and desperate men trying to find new lives for themselves and their families. Though only a remnant of its former greatness
column9: this Empire-in-Exile could easily prove a grave threat to its neighbors.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTNAMEINVADERS6;Massive Settlement;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESCINVADERS6;Having established a new ream for themselves in the West
column2: [Root.GetTitledName] has decided to settle many of those who fled in their new lands. Already a wide-scale building campaign is working to provide housing and settlements for the newcomers to live in
column3: fuelled primarily by grants of land taken from the natives.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA_INVADERS6;Excellent;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTB_INVADERS6;Interesting;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESCINVADERS7;Large swathes of our migrating population has decided to settle down in [Root.GetName]
column2: massively expanding its infrastructure as well as displacing the rebellious native population.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTOPTA_INVADERS7;Excellent;;;;;;;;;x
bharatva1Desc;Though there have always been warriors dedicated to fighting for the Bharatva faith
column2: so far they have been isolated and scattered
column3: unable to coordinate their efforts beyond their local areas. Now
column4: a group of powerful rulers have come together to provide extensive financial support for an order of holy warriors dedicated to defending the Bhartva faith from all its enemies. These warriors have called themselves the Shiv Sena
column5: and have sworn not to fight fellow followers of the religion of Bharat.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: bharatva1Title;The Shiv Sena;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTA_bharatva1;Jai Hind!;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTB_bharatva1;Those antiquarian murderers!;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTC_bharatva1;May Allah destroy those violent heathens!;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTD_bharatva1;The Bharatvists are organising? That could be dangerous...;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTE_bharatva1;Who?;;;;;;;;;x
bharatva2Title;The Shiv Sena;;;;;;;;;x
bharatva2Desc;The Bharatva religion has always been combatative
column2: dedicated to expelling heathens and adharma from the holy land of India. However
column3: they have recently suffered many defeats and setbacks
column4: which has greatly worried many of the faithful. [From.GetTitledName] has heard these worries
column5: and has decreed the formation of a new order for the defense of India. This new holy order
column7: is to be a band of warriors devoted to the defense of the Bharatva religion
column8: and is not to fight coreligionists under any circumstances. The Shiv Sena will surely be a prominent force in the religious wars of India from now on.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: bharatva3Title;Rise of Bharat;;;;;;;;;x
bharatva3Desc;For centuries
column2: India has been splintered
column3: and indeed can hardly be called a realm in any but the loosest possible sense. However
column4: [From.GetTitledName] has reversed centuries of decline and turned it back
column5: winning glorious battles and unifying all of India beneath one banner. Now
column6: the great Empire of Bharat is unified once again
column7: and the holy land of India is safe from foreign invaders.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: bharatva4Title;The Dharmayudda;;;;;;;;;x
bharatva4Desc;Though the Bharatva religion has always advocated for holy struggle to liberate India from foreign religion and wickedness
column2: their efforts have hardly ever been united
column3: and they have spent nearly as much time fighting each other as fighting heathens. The Mahapandit has declared that this has gone on too long. In a fiery speech given before a crowd of thousands
column4: he has declared that all faithful Hindus should unite against the infidels
column5: and strive together to reclaim the sacred land. This marks the beginning of a new era of Hindu holy wars - the Dharmayuddas.;;;;;;;;;x
